rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with a reception area featuring Vastu compliant placement of the main door to welcome positive energy.

Open-plan living room integrated with dining area, ensuring ample natural light and ventilation in accordance with Vastu guidelines. Features large windows on the east to capture early morning sunlight.
Modern kitchen designed for efficiency and functionality; positioned towards the north as per Vastu recommendations. Includes an integrated dining nook.
Luxurious master bedroom with attached ensuite bathroom located in a peaceful corner of the house. North-eastern placement to harness positive energy.
Second bedroom situated on the west side of the layout; designed for privacy and comfort with ample storage space.
Compact dressing room adjoining the master suite to provide convenience.
Functional study or home office area positioned in the northeast corner for enhanced productivity and Vastu harmony.
Dedicated servant's quarters ensuring privacy. Strategically placed at the back of the property to maintain the primary householdâ€™s seclusion.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned on the east facing wall to invite auspicious energy as per Vastu principles.
Large windows installed in living and dining areas for maximum natural light and ventilation; east-facing windows preferred.

garden.description: Expansive garden surrounding the townhouse with a focus on colonial landscaping aesthetics, integrated water features, and native plant species to maintain eco-friendliness and relaxation.
